page.title: 13Sports in Onecote
page.content:
A lot of the children in Onecote also like to roller-skate. Each person takes a pair of roller-skates along to the old school playground which they use as a roller-skating rink for doing stunts and just having good fun. A cassette player is usually taken along too and the children dance to the music.
Dinghy races are held on the River Hamps but the competitors go along just for fun.
People also swim in the river.
Shooting is quite a regular activity, especially among the farmers. Most weekends they will phone each other up to arrange the place and time.
